overview: James graduated from Samford University in Birmingham, Alabama where he earned a degree in Finance. Upon graduation James established a strong sales base working as an Account Executive for Low Mileage Engines, LLC. Realizing his passion was high-level sales and team building, James moved to Los Angeles to pursue a career in Technical Recruiting and currently holds the title of Lead Recruiter.
